author: Neil Munro, Neil Munro
title: ICE Detention Numbers Drop amid Disease, Deportations
description: The U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency is reducing the number of migrants in detention as the coronavirus spreads through the agency's many holding centers.
content:
The U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency is reducing the number of migrants in detention as China’s coronavirus spreads through the agency’s many holding centers.
ICE’s reduction in detainees spotlights the sharp drop in new arrivals at the border… [+5552 chars]
